features: EFFECTIVE WITHOUT USE OF HARMFUL INGREDIENTS: Specifically formulated for pre-teens and teenagers, Fresh Kidz deodorants provide 24-hour protection by effectively combating body odor, and do this with the well-being of kids as a top priority. Available in a variety of fragrances for boys and girls. Our Blue Boys range has a clean citrus scent with notes of bergamot, rosemary and neroli.

GENTLE ON YOUNG AND SENSETIVE SKIN: A lot of kids have undesirable reactions to chemicals in products applied to the skin. Conventional chemical deodorants, and antiperspirants in particular, can cause serious discomfort. Fresh Kidz can help you avoid these and prevent dry, chaffed, and itchy skin. Dermatologically tested and suitable for all skin types.

PROTECTS AGAINST BODY ODOR: As parents we don’t want our children to have to deal with stigma and teasing that can occur if they have body odor. Fresh Kidz deodorant is available for boys and girls in fragrances that are age-appropriate, fresh and clean smelling.

NO HARMFUL CHEMICALS: We offer a range of chemical-free personal hygiene products for kids and young teens that parents can trust! Fresh Kidz products are free- of harmful chemicals, while still providing effective, all-day, odor protection. Deodorant is free- of Aluminum, Parabens, Alcohol and Harsh Sulfates. Cruelty-free and vegan.

MADE IN THE USA: All Fresh Kidz products are made in the US and are the favorite choice of parents and kids alike. Keep your kids clean and confident with our range of body washes and deodorants for boys and girls.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep It Kind introduces Fresh Kidz, a range of chemical free personal hygiene products for kids and young teens that parents can trust! Our products provide effective, all-day odor without the use of any harmful chemicals. No Aluminum, No Parabens, No Alcohol, No Harsh Sulfates, No Harmful Chemicals, No Worries! Before Fresh Kidz was created, parents of kids who had entered puberty faced a dilemma. There simply wasn't a range of hygiene products for pre-teens, ‘tweens’ and teenagers that were not only effective, but made kids feel confident using them. Keep It Kind, the brand behind the Fresh Kidz range, took this challenge head-on. With passion and personal experience, we made sure that our products fought against odor while never compromising safety. With over 20 years of pharmaceutical experience, our founders discovered that there was a huge need for a kids deodorant range that simply wasn't being filled. They went on to spend several years working closely with leading science laboratories, developing Deodorant formula for younger, sensitive skin and free from any potentially harmful chemicals. Our ultimate mission is to create a range of personal and skincare products for teens and tweens, that's both parents and kids love. We continue to research and develop products that are ideal for the modern, more informed generation of today.

FRESH KIDZ Boys Blue Deodorant, 1.86 fl. oz. Some kids may actually need deodorant and some may just want to make it a part of their morning routine to feel more confident and grown up. Either way, Fresh Kidz Blue Deodorant is a great pick. It'll keep him feeling and smelling fresh throughout the entire day and all of his sports and activities. The roll-on deodorant goes on smoothly, doesn't clog pores and is free from aluminum, alcohol, artificial colors, parabens and other harsh chemicals that can irritate sensitive skin.

FACTS! We understand the concerns of parents when it comes to all the harmful chemicals that our kids are exposed to. With that in mind, we have taken the time and care to ensure that Fresh Kidz products are free of harmful ingredients. They contain NO Ethyl alcohol, aluminum, parabens, artificial color, triclosan, propylene glycol or artificial preservatives. All our products are also Vegan and designed for the needs and sensitivities common to kids, teens, tweens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeping My Mini Me Smelling Fresh & Confident!
reviews.reviewText: Forget sticky sprays and confusing gels, Fresh Kidz Roll-On Deodorant is a game-changer for parents of active (and sometimes stinky) kiddos! Here's why we gave it two thumbs up:Gentle on Sensitive Skin: My little adventurer has the skin of a delicate flower, but this deodorant plays nice. It's aluminum-free and baking soda-free, so no more itchy armpits or red rashes. We even tested it after a sweaty soccer game, and nada! Just happy armpits all around.Freshness that Lasts: Don't be fooled by the "kid-friendly" label. This stuff gets the job done. My tween son smells fresh and clean all day long, even after gym class and playground sprints. Bonus points for the subtle, kid-approved scents – no overpowering perfume smells here!Easy to Use: Say goodbye to messy sprays and sticky residues! This roll-on glides on smoothly, even my butter-fingered kiddo can handle it. The clear applicator makes it easy to see where they've applied, preventing missed spots and wasted deodorant.Fun & Practical: Forget boring white bottles! These brightly colored deodorants with playful designs are like little works of art themselves. My son actually enjoys using it, which is a win in my book. And the compact size fits perfectly in her backpack for on-the-go freshness.The Verdict: 5 out of 5 fragrant stars! Fresh Kidz Roll-On Deodorant has become a staple in our bathroom cabinet. It's gentle, effective, fun to use, and keeps my little one smelling fresh and confident throughout the day. Highly recommend for active kiddos of all sorts!P.S. Bonus points for the affordable price tag! You can keep those stinky odors at bay without breaking the bank. Now go forth and conquer the playground (and gym class!) with fresh confidence!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on my stinky 8 year old
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my sons who are 8 years old. They are starting to smell a little and I wanted to get them used to wearing deodorant. I didn't want something with harsh chemicals or aluminum. I decided to go with this brand and I'm glad I did. It has been working great and keeps my boys smelling fresh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good "beginner" deodorant for boys
reviews.reviewText: My 11 year old needed to start using deodorant, and I wanted something that was just a deodorant and not an antiperspirant (no aluminum). This works great! Helps keep the stink away. He doesn't mind using it. A little wet feeling at first - I just tell him give it a few minutes to dry. He doesn't mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very small… light weight. The smell isn’t that bad. In order for it to be effective you need to roll it multiple times. Otherwise, it’s good for the price and my kids ages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 9 year old love it!!!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the boys deodorant for my son, and I must say I am extremely pleased with my purchase. Not only does my son love the scent, but it also lasts for hours, which is a huge plus. The deodorant is easy to apply and dries quickly, leaving no residue behind. I feel like this product is a great investment for parents who have active boys who need a reliable deodorant that can keep up with their daily activities. I also appreciate that the product is made with natural ingredients, so I know that my son is not being exposed to harmful chemicals. Overall, I highly recommend this boys deodorant to other parents looking for a high-quality and effective product for their active boys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my son. I wanted to purchase something safer and free from aluminum. This product fit the bill and works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comes out excessively!!!
reviews.reviewText: It releases too much product!!! Makes a mess for no reason which is weird cause that’s the reason why I change the paste to a roll on… cause my son always broke the paste and smushed it. This roll on makes as much mess which is NOT COMMON for roll on deodorants. Smells good, but I’m a little disappointed .
Easy to roll on. Smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It smells devine! My 12 years old son loves it!
Amazing product! Easy to use, safe and smells fantastic!
My nephew loved the how the scent smelled fresh!! Very easy to use for kids! definitely will buy again!

Great product, the smell is not gender specific and very mild, but I had to hide the t labels, as I was sent the girl deodorant instead of the boy one that I ordered, and my son being 9 and a half, he would not use it if he thought it was for girls 🤷🏼‍♀️
